page.title: 05SEATS OF LEARNING COV S.W.
page.content: The City Council provide 10{Primary schools for pupils aged 5-11 years where they learn reading, writing, mathematics, history, geography, & science. Most enjoy artwork & sports. Three are run by churches. Some have separate infant departments. At 11 years most transfer to {Comprehensive}schools where studies are extended. Examinations for leaving certificates are taken at 16 years.Children with learning problems are taught in small groups at Alice Stevens School. Seven{private}schools offer other courses as well as a general one. Some prepare pupils for the Coventry Grammar School.The {Technical College}&{Lanchester {Polytechnic}offer various courses for adults to gain degrees or other qualifications for employment.
